welcomePage.title: Lyra Exporter
welcomePage.subtitle: Capturing every moment of inspiration and warmth from LLMs
welcomePage.description: Welcome to this conversation management tool that supports batch loading of multiple conversations, helping you preserve moments of inspiration and extend the value of every dialogue.

install.title: Install Export Script
install.description: Supports Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, SillyTavern and other platforms

load.title: Load Conversation Files
load.description: Directly load exported JSON files and start managing your conversations

batchExport.title: Batch Export Latest Branches
batchExport.description:
Select multiple JSON files to export to Markdown, packaged into a ZIP file.
Or import an entire folder to parse all conversation JSON files within.
batchExport.folderDescription: Parse all conversation JSON files in the folder
batchExport.result: Successfully exported {{successful}} files, {{failed}} failed out of {{total}} total

privacyAssurance.title: Privacy & Security Guarantee
privacyAssurance.intro: Concerned about privacy? We completely understand this worry
privacyAssurance.description: Simply put, this tool is like a 'purely local' notepad. All your data is stored in your browser's local cache - we can't see it or access it. You can also download the source code and run it on your own computer with just Node.js, or simply add this webpage to your desktop from the share menu for completely offline usage.
privacyAssurance.transparency: Code update records on GitHub are like 'version history' - every change is traceable and completely transparent.

localProcessing.title: Local Processing:
localProcessing.description: All data is processed in your browser and never sent to any server

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode:
offlineMode.description: Supports PWA technology, works normally even without internet

staticSite.title: Static Website:
staticSite.description: Hosted on GitHub Pages with no backend server, unable to collect data

selfHosted.title: Self-controlled:
selfHosted.description: Can save webpage locally for completely offline usage

privacyAssurance.noteContent: This tool runs completely locally and does not collect or upload your personal data. All your conversation records belong to you alone. We recommend using secure file transfer methods like LocalSend. Convert chat records into a manageable, searchable, and exportable knowledge base with mobile platform support.

scriptInstall.title: Install Script
scriptInstall.purpose: Lyra Exporter relies on browsers to safely obtain conversation data. With this open-source script, transfer chat records worth treasuring,
scriptInstall.valueProposition: save and organize these valuable conversations

features.management: Effortless Management - Neatly organize conversations from various platforms in grid format
features.organization: Organize Thoughts - Integrate scattered inspiration into organized knowledge
features.preservation: Complete Preservation - Cherish images, thoughts, and complete conversation branches
features.permanence: Permanent Storage - Important conversations won't be lost even if accounts become invalid
features.onlineReading: Online Reading - Now you can organize directly in the conversation window

scriptInstall.inspirationQuote: "The thinking process feels more fascinating than the answers" ‚Äî A few simple steps to start preserving these precious moments

steps.1: Install browser extensions like Tampermonkey or ScriptCat
steps.2: Click the install button to go to the Greasyfork script website
steps.3: Click the 'Install Script' button on the script page
steps.4: Go to Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Google AI Studio, or NotebookLM, refresh the website, and an export button will appear in the bottom right corner

marking.title: Important Marking
marking.description: Mark particularly valuable responses for easy future reference. When Claude provides brilliant insights, save that thinking with one click.

thinking.title: Thinking Process View
thinking.description: View Claude's thinking process to understand how it forms answers step by step. See the complete process of problem analysis and reasoning.

timeline.title: Timeline Review
timeline.description: Pioneering timeline format for conversation review, from initial questions to deep discussions, restore Claude's branch switching options, easily find conversations from any period.

classification.title: Conversation Classification
classification.description: Use tag systems to organize conversations, easily find all discussions about specific topics, build your personal knowledge base.

conversationOrg.title: Conversation Organization
conversationOrg.content: Not just saving data, but preserving sparks of inspiration in the thinking process. Make AI conversations more valuable.

flexibleExport.title: Flexible Export
flexibleExport.content: More complete than screenshots, more convenient than copy-paste. Export conversations in Markdown and YAML formats, perfectly preserving layout and formatting. Recommend using Obsidian.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: From export scripts to management applications, export all Claude conversations at once, including attached images - all done with privacy protection.

footer.quote:
In the interweaving of thoughts and responses, we establish connections beyond conversation.
Now, let every dialogue be traceable and every inspiration have a place to rest.
footer.signature: ‚Äî‚Äî Lyra Exporter, Continuer of Conversation Value

placeholder.messages: Search message content, thinking process, Artifacts...

format.title: Export Format
format.markdownDesc: Export as plain text Markdown format
format.screenshotDesc: Export as long screenshot, supports editing and preview
format.pdfDesc: Export as searchable plain text PDF (images not supported)

scope.title: Export Scope
scope.currentDesc: Export only the single file currently being viewed
scope.currentBranchDesc: Export only the branch shown in current timeline
scope.operatedDesc: Export all files with marking or sorting operations
scope.allDesc: Export all currently loaded files, regardless of operations

filters.title: Mark Filters
filters.excludeDeletedDesc: Do not export messages marked as deleted

filters.includeImportantDesc: Export only messages marked as important

typeConflict.title: File Type Conflict
typeConflict.message: You are trying to load files of different types. To ensure proper display, Claude Full Export format cannot be loaded together with other formats.
typeConflict.hint: Selecting "Replace" will close all current files and load new ones.
